markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="">
[Ritual Obstruction](/Spells.aspx?ID=1217)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 79

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 day
</row>

</column>

---

You establish a zone of magical feedback that makes it impossible to succeed at rituals of this spell's level or lower in the area. _Ritual obstruction_ ignores all cover, including walls and ceilings, to the extent of its area. Anyone attempting to cast a ritual within the area knows, when they begin to cast the ritual, the area is cursed to impede rituals. Any ritual cast in the area can't have a final result better than failure.
name: Ritual Obstruction

</summary>

summary_markdown: You establish a zone of magical feedback that makes it impossible to succeed at rituals of this spell's level or lower in the area.
text: Ritual Obstruction May contain spoilers from Blood Lords Source Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw pg. 79 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult, Primal Cast 1 minute (material, somatic, verbal) Area 60-foot burst Duration 1 day --- You establish a zone of magical feedback that makes it impossible to succeed at rituals of this spell's level or lower in the area. Ritual obstruction ignores all cover, including walls and ceilings, to the extent of its area. Anyone attempting to cast a ritual within the area knows, when they begin to cast the ritual, the area is cursed to impede rituals. Any ritual cast in the area can't have a final result better than failure.
